00022 #ifndef _CANARYWITHPRIOR_H
00023 #define _CANARYWITHPRIOR_H

00026 #include "canary/BroadEstepper1.h"
00027 #include "canary/CanaryModel.h"
00028 #include "canary/CanaryOptions.h"
00029 #include "canary/CanaryPenalty.h"
00030 #include "canary/CanaryPrior.h"
00031 //
00032 #include <map>
00033 #include <valarray>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 //
00036 
00037 class CanaryWithPrior {
00038 public:
00039   // Constructed in the cpp file
00040   CanaryWithPrior(CanaryOptions& opts, 
00041                   std::valarray<double>& vals_in,
00042                   CanaryPrior& prior_in);
00043 
00044   valarray<double> vals() { return _vals; }
00045   CanaryPrior prior() { return _prior; }
00046 
00047   CanaryPenalty penalty(std::string model_name) {
00048     return CP_map[model_name]; 
00049     }
00050 
00051   BroadEstepper1 fitted_values(std::string model_name) {
00052     // cant say this as it creates a BroadEstepper1 if the model name isnt found.
00053     //return BE_map[model_name];
00054     std::map<std::string,BroadEstepper1>::iterator i;
00055     i=BE_map.find(model_name);
00056     if (i==BE_map.end()) {
00057       Err::errAbort("Didnt find entry for model: '" + model_name + "'");
00058     }
00059     return i->second;
00060   }
00061 
00062   BroadEstepper1 gmm_withprior(valarray<double> vals,
00063       std::vector<int> cluster_vec);
00064 
00065   CanaryPenalty assay_fit(BroadEstepper1 BE,std::vector<int> cluster_vec);
00066 
00067   std::string best_fit();
00068 
00069 private:
00070   valarray<double>_vals;
00071   CanaryPrior _prior;
00072   std::map<std::string,CanaryPenalty>CP_map;
00073   std::map<std::string,BroadEstepper1>BE_map;
00074   CanaryModel _canary_model;
00075   //
00076   CanaryOptions& _opts;
00077 };
